01 信息设计时代下中国设计教育绎思
—— 访谈广州美术学院尹定邦教授
Constructing an Informative Design of China: An Interview with Professor Yin Dingbang of Guangzhou Academy of Fine Arts
袁晓芳 YUAN Xiaofang 张萌 ZHANG Meng 武汉理工大学，湖北武汉 430070（Wuhan University of Technology，430070 Wuhan Hubei）
摘要：随着历史的推移，百年前诞生的世界设计也随着时间不断衍变。信息设计时代的到来，使人类生活发生了翻天覆地的变化。 中国作为世界第一大发展中国家，在全球经济中扮演着重要的角色。但由于历史原因和特殊的国情，中国信息设计远远落后于发 达国家。在此背景之下，广州美术学院设计学学科创始人尹定邦教授阐述了中国信息设计落后的原因并提出未来信息设计教育发 展的可行性建议。 关键词：信息设计；设计教育；中国设计 Abstract: The world design has undergone changes with the development of history. The information design era has greatly changed people’s life. Nowadays, China, as the biggest developing country in the world, plays a critical role in global economy. Due to history and special situation, Chinese information design is not as advanced as other developed countries. Therefore, Professor Yin Dingbang indicates the reason why Chinese informative design falls behind other countries and illustrates some reliable proposals for Chineseinformative design in the years to come. Key words: Information Design；Design Education；Chinese Design
中图分类号：J0 文献标识码：A doi：10.3963/j.issn.2095-0705.2018.04.001
尹定邦教师简介：广州美术学院教授 、博士 生导师 ，广东省美术家协会副主席 ，广东省工业 设计协会会长 ，中国工业设计协会副理事长 ，光 华龙腾奖中国设计贡献奖金质奖章获得者 ，广州 美术学院设计学学科创始人 ，设计理论家和教育 家 ，被誉为中国现代设计开拓者和领路人 。
收稿日期：2018-08-06 作者简介：袁晓芳（1982—），女，武汉理工大学艺术与设计学院副教授，博士研究生导师；张萌（1992—），男，武汉理工大学艺术与设计学院 博士研究生，研究方向为信息与交互设计。

成乔明 CHENG Qiaoming 南京航空航天大学 , 南京 210016（Nanjing University of Aeronautic and Astronautic , Nanjing 210016）
摘要：设计是将记忆进行解构的过程与活动，这是设计思维的根源。解与构都深刻体现了设计师的情感转移，有意识情感转移是 记忆的延续，模仿出了设计作品的经典形；无意识情感转移是记忆的突破，创造出了设计作品的奇异形。所谓设计的继承是对熟 悉情感的迷恋，所谓设计的创新是对陌生情感的探奇。设计创新是有度的陌生，过度的陌生使人产生恐惧感，此时设计就又开始 回归经典形。 关键词：设计；逻辑原理；记忆；情感转移 Abstract: Design is a process and an activity of deconstructing, which is the root of design thinking. Both decomposition andreconstruction deeplyembody the emotional transfer of designer. On the one hand, the conscious emotion transfer is the continuation of the memory andimitates the classical form of the design work. On the other hand, the unconscious emotion transfer is the breakthrough of the memory and creates a novelshape. Design inheritance is the fascination with the familiar emotion and design innovation is the exploration of the novel emotion. Designinnovation is the strangeness with a certain degree. Excessive strangeness arouses fear. On this occasion, the design begins to return to the classicalform. Key words: design；Logic Principle；memory；emotion transfer

05 历史文化记忆的再生： 登琨艳对“老建筑”保护 性设计的思想研究*
The Regeneration of Historical and Cultural Memory: A Study on the Thought of Protective Design of Old Buildings
by Deng Kunyan
代锋 Dai Feng 江苏科技大学，江苏镇江212003 （Jiangsu University of Science and Technology , 212003 Zhenjiang Jiangsu）
摘要：在城市化的进程中，虽然带有历史文化的老建筑能够引起人们的重视，但是由于各地方保护政策的不完善与保护态度的差 异，老建筑的保护与再生仍然面临严峻的挑战。通过探析登琨艳对上海苏州河畔一栋具有历史文化的老建筑的保护性设计思想， 呈现了中国传统文化在建筑空间情境营造上的一种可能，为中国历史文化建筑的保护与再生提供一种可借鉴的方式。 关键词：登琨艳；老建筑；保护性设计；思想 Abstract: In the process of rapid urban construction, though the historical and cultural old buildings can arouse people's attention, owing toits inadequate protection policy and different protection attitude, the protection and reconstruction of old buildings have been facingsevere challenges. By analyzing a historical and cultural old building along Suzhou River in Shanghai, which is a protective design work by Deng Kunyan, it proposes a possibility to Chinese traditional culture in the construction of the building space, and provides a referenceto protection and reconstruction about Chinese historical and cultural architecture. Key words: Deng Kunyan；old buildings；Protective Design；thought

06 江南地域人文环境对本土油画的深层影响*
The Deep Influence of the Cultural Environment in Jiangnan Regions on the Local Oil Painting
余方林 YU Fanglin 江南影视艺术职业学院，江苏无锡 214100（Jiangnan Vocational College of Media Arts，214100 Wuxi Jiangsu）
摘要：意象图式的江南油画具有较强的地域文化性，它的发生、发展受到了江南自然地理环境、隐性的江南诗性文化精神和文人 画传统，以及江南地域文化性格、审美心理等多方面因素的影响，它在现当代的发生、发展具有鲜明的独特性、地域性、传承性、 时代性特点。从江南油画的题材的选择、艺术风格以及表现手法方面来考察地域人文环境对江南油画的影响，可以深层次地了解 江南本土油画的历史和现状，有利于油画民族化、本土化探索，具有重要的现实意义。 关键词：江南油画；江南地域文化性格；文人画传统；江南地域人文环境 Abstract: The Jiangnan oil painting in image schema has a strong regional culture. Its occurrence and development have been influenced by the natural geographical environment, the recessive poetic cultural spirit and the literatipainting tradition, as well as the cultural character in Jiangnan regions and the esthetic psychology, and have the distinct characteristicsof uniqueness, territoriality, inheritance and time in the modern and contemporary era. This paper examines the impact of regional humanistic environment on the Jiangnan oil painting from the selection of the subject matter, the artistic style and the expression techniqueof the Jiangnan oil painting to deeply understand the history and the current situation of the local oil painting in Jiangnan regions. It is conducive to the nationalization and localization exploration of oil painting and has an important practical significance. Key words: Jiangnan Oil Painting；Cultural Character in Jiangnan Regions；Literati Painting Tradition；Humanistic Environment in JiangnanRegions

摘要：文章以笔者亲身调研与参与的明尼苏达大学二年级下学期室内工作室课程为例，通过教学项目的设置、教学内容的组织和 教学效果的评价等方面的介绍，总结了对我国艺术设计教学的几点启示，即横向的跨学科设置课程、纵向的与企业对接教学以及 运用灵活、现代化的教育技术手段和开放系统的教学互评体系，以期为我国的设计教育改革提供参考。 关键词：室内设计；教学实践；工作室课程 Abstract: The University of Minnesota is one of the most prestigious and comprehensive universities in the United States. The interior design course of the School of Design is a professional course accredited by the American Interior Design Accreditation Council (CIDA). The article takes the author's personal research and participation in second semester of indoor studio course of the second year of the Universityof Minnesota as an example. By analyzing the course setting, contents organization and curriculum evaluation, the paper gets several important enlightenments for Art & Design education in China, including intercrossing different subjects horizontally, docking to enterprise, flexibly applying modern skills and opening evaluation system vertically, expecting to provide reference for China's designeducation reform. Key words: Interior Design；Educational Practice；Studio Course

08 艺术管理学科属性与学科设置研究
A Brief Analysis of Characteristics and Subjects Setting of Art Management Discipline
杜娟 DU Juan 杜晓茹 DU Xiaoru 王孟孟 WANG Mengmeng 武汉理工大学，湖北武汉 430070（Wuhan University of Technology，430070 Wuhan Hubei）
摘要：界定艺术管理学科属性为交叉学科，认为艺术管理理论是艺术学理论体系中的一个组成部分。对艺术管理学科出现的动力 因素进行分析，从社会实践需求和学科主体理论自身发展特征方面，阐释艺术管理学科出现的必然性。根据国内外艺术管理专业 课程设置，总结学科设置主要有实践带动性与研究带动性两大类，由此分析不同的院校人才培养模式。 关键词：艺术管理；学科属性；发展动力；学科设置；艺术教育 Abstract: This paper defines the interdisciplinary nature of art management, and holds that art management theory is an integral part of thetheoretical system of art.It also analyzes the dynamic factors of the emergence of art management discipline，and explains the inevitabilityof the emergence of art management discipline through the social practice needs and the development characteristics of subject theoryaspects.According to the curriculum settings of current domestic and foreign art management discipline，it summarizes the characteristics ofdiscipline settings for practice-driven and research-driven into two major categories，and makes an analysis on training mode in these two types of colleges and universities. Key words: Art Management；characteristics of Discipline；development motivation；Subject Setting；Art Education

09 创新创业人才培养与艺术设计专业实践教学模式 创新*
Innovative and Entrepreneurial Training and Innovation in Practical Teaching Model of Art Design
张亚敏 Zhang Yamin 武汉理工大学，湖北武汉 430070（Wuhan University of Technology，430070 Wuhan Hubei）
摘要：艺术设计专业实践教学是培养“双创”型人才的基本途径，也是人才培养模式改革的核心内容。通过调查研究、实践问题分 析等方法，分析艺术专业实践教学与培养创新创业人才的关系。研究发现，在“双创”背景下，艺术设计专业人才培养面临专业定 位模糊、实践教学资源短缺、人才培养体系不完善等诸多实践困境，当务之急是明确人才培养目标，完善课程体系，营造创新创 业文化，强化校企合作，切实推进艺术设计专业实践教学模式改革。工作室实践教学模式是国内外流行的艺术设计人才教育模式， 新时期需要结合培养“双创”人才的目标进行针对性探索和实践。 关键词：创新创业人才；实践教学模式；工作室实践教学；人才培养模式 Abstract: Practical teaching of art design is a basic way to cultivate innovative and entrepreneurial talents, and it is also the corecontent of the reform of talent training mode. The paper mainly analyzes the relationship between the practical teaching of art major andthe cultivation of investigation and practical problem analysis. Under the background of innovative and entrepreneurial talents training, thecultivation of art design major faces many practical dilemmas such as fuzzy professional positioning, shortage of practical teachingresources, and inadequate personnel training system. It is imperative to clarify the goal of talent training, improve the curriculum system,create a culture of innovation and entrepreneurship, strengthen the cooperation between schools and enterprises, and effectively promotethe reform of the practical teaching model of art design. The studio practical teaching is a popular art design education model both athome and abroad.In the new era, it is necessary to combine the targeted exploration and practice withtraining objectives of innovativeand entrepreneurial talents. Key words: Innovative Entrepreneurial Talent；practical teaching mode；studio practical teaching；talent training mode

12 儿童安防产品的情趣化设计研究
Delight-oriented Design of Children's Security Products
吴绍兰WU Shaolan 吴学晨WU Xuechen 福州大学厦门工艺美术学院，福建厦门 361024 （Xiamen institute of arts and crafts， Fuzhouuniversity，361024 Xiamen Fujian）
摘要：研究情趣化设计在儿童安防产品中的应用，降低儿童遭遇安全风险的隐患。分析儿童安全现状、儿童安防产品的目标用户 特点，从情趣化设计理论出发，在造型、色彩、交互式体验等方面对儿童安防产品进行探究。儿童安防产品引入情趣化的设计理 念不仅能够增强产品的趣味性，还能降低产品的功能辨识性，从而更好地保护儿童健康发展。 关键词：儿童安全；情趣化设计；儿童安防产品 Abstract: The paper studies the application of delight-oriented design in children's security products to reduce the risk of children's exposure to safety risks. It analyzes the status quo of children's safety and the characteristics of target users of children's security products. Based on the theory delight-oriented Design，children's security products are analyzed in terms of modeling, color and interactive experience. The introduction of the child-friendly product design concept not only enhances the fun of the product, but also reduces the functional recognition of the product, thus better protecting the healthy development of children. Key words: child safety；delight-oriented design；children's security products

一、引言 在儿童安防产品的设计上解决儿童的安全问 题 ，保护孩子的身心健康是设计者的首要责任 。 近年来 ，儿童在遭遇走失 、拐卖 、受虐 、 设计儿童穿戴式安防产品时 ，引入情趣化设计原 校园欺凌以及意外伤害等事故日益频发 ，这些事 则 ，能够提升孩子对产品的使用兴趣 ，增强产品 件正不断危害着儿童的身心健康 ，对儿童的成长 与用户之间的联系 ，有效弥补儿童安防产品在功 造成了难以估量的影响 。儿童安全问题成为人们 能识别性上和造型方面的短板 ，从而让产品更好 所关注的焦点 ，孩子能够在安全健康的环境下茁 地服务于用户 。 壮成长是每位家长的祈盼 。

13 服务设计的满意度动态评价方法
Dynamic Evaluation of Service Design Satisfaction
周祎德 ZHOU Yide 彭希赫 PENG Xihe 昆明理工大学，云南昆明 650500 （Kunming University of Science and Technology，650500 Kunming Yunnan）
摘要：传统的满意度评价是对用户体验“结果”的整体性测量，运用控制、调节的手段，从效率和效能方面提升体验质量，其评价 结果相对静态，不能及时处理变化中的复杂性问题。服务设计思维，是不断迭代进化的“动态”策略，结合RATER满意评价体系， 提出全景式的动态满意度评价思路，分别从“接触性”与“过程性”的视角，持续评价服务体验满意度，通过“反馈―修正”的动态 设计循环，不断提高用户满意度的“感知差距”，实现溯源性评价。 关键词：满意度；服务设计；动态评价；适应性 Abstract: Traditional satisfaction evaluation is a whole measurement of customer experience result. This evaluation is intended to improve experience quality in efficiency and effectiveness by means of control and regulation. The result of this method is relatively staticand it cannot deal with the complexity of change in time. Service design thinking is a kind of “dynamic” design which is optimized byconstant iteration. Combined with ranking satisfaction evaluation system, this paper proposes apanoramic dynamic satisfaction evaluation idea. From the perspective of "contact" and "process", service experience satisfaction is continuously evaluated and continuously improved through "feedback-revision" dynamic design cycle. The "perception gap" of user satisfaction can be used to achieve traceability evaluation. Key words: degree of satisfaction；service design；dynamic evaluation；adaptability

摘要：文章分析了区域文创赋能的概念及内涵，强调其对于新产业、新城乡、新场景的积极影响，就新时代背景下设计的主体责 任展开了设计文化的价值探究，认为设计在区域文创赋能体系中是基础和源动力、手段和保障。设计在文创、品牌传播方面的积 极作用，保障了区域文创赋能体系的有效发挥，平等设计的理念更是建立了基于全民创造的区域文化自信，区域文创赋能和创新 设计的价值体现践行了文化自信的核心理念，对于区域振兴起着建设性的作用。 关键词：区域文创赋能；设计；文化自信 Abstract: This paper analyzes the concept and connotation of regional and cultural creativity empowerment, emphasizes its positive impacton new industries, new urban and rural areas and newscenes, and explores the value of design culture on the main responsibility of designin the context of new era. In the system of creating and empowering, it is the foundation and source of power, means and guarantee. The positive roles of design in cultural creativity and brand communication guarantee the effective play of regionaland cultural creativity empowerment system. The concept of equal design is to establish the regional cultural self-confidence based on the creation of the whole people, the value of regional cultural creation and innovative design. It reflects the core concept of practicing cultural self-confidence and plays a constructive role in regional revitalization. Key words: region cultural and creative industries empowerment； design； cultural confidence

摘要：在碎微化、即时化的知识与信息传播新模式下，人们的生活和工作方式都发生了巨大的变化。微建筑以小巧的体型、丰富 的可实现功能及多样的形式融入当代社会，并以其特有的亲和力和广泛的接受度成为一个技术载体、视觉奇观与文化现象。技术 与文化是促进微建筑这一空间形式不断发展的两个核心要素。在微文化背景下，微建筑通过技术所构筑的新空间形成了合理的功 能，一方面它促进了人与人之间的交流，极大地丰富了其文化内涵；另一方面它甚至可以完美地嫁接于创意设计产业，发挥产业 化的规模和整体优势，为产业发展和升级提供新的动力，进而有效地解决社会诸多问题。 关键词：微建筑；微文化；设计产业 Abstract: Under the new mode of fragmentation and instantaneity of knowledge and information dissemination, great changes have taken place in people's life and work style. With its compact size, rich realizable functions and various forms, micro-architecture is integrated into thecontemporary society, and becomes a technical carrier, visual wonder and cultural phenomenon with its unique affinity and wide acceptance.Technology and culture are two core elements to promote the continuous development of micro architecture. In the context of micro-culture, micro-architecture has formed a reasonable function through the new space constructed by technology. On the one hand, it promotes the communication between people and greatly enriches its cultural connotation; on the other hand, it can even be perfectly grafted on the creative design industries, give fullplay to the overall advantages of industrialization, effectively solve social problems,and provide new impetus for industrial development and upgrading. Key words: Micro-architecture；Micro-culture；design industry

摘要：针对当下湛江特产品牌形象设计的现状与问题，笔者提出将情感体验融入湛江特产品牌形象设计之中，最大限度地发挥湛 江特产品牌形象所具有的文化内涵，从而将其内在气质调动出来，形成独特的品牌文化，让消费者购买到的不仅仅是特产本身， 而且还能享受到愉快的情感体验过程。恰当的品牌形象设计能够让更多的消费者与品牌建立起体验情感，这种情感的联系将成为 消费者认可特产品牌个性、支持特产品牌的保证。 关键词：情感体验；湛江特产；品牌形象设计 Abstract: Considering the current status quo and problems of Zhanjiang specialty products brand image design, it is proposed to integrate theemotional experience into the brand image design of Zhanjiang special products, which maximizes the expression of cultural connotation of Zhanjiang specialty products brand image, mobilizes its internal temperament and forms a uniquebrand culture. In addition to buying the specialty itself, consumer can also enjoya pleasant emotional experience. Moreover, appropriate brand image design can encourage consumersand brands to establish experience emotions. This kinds of emotional tie will guarantee the consumers to recognize the special product brandpersonality and support the special product brand. Study on Landscape Design of Pastoral Complex under the View of Forest Protection： Taking Qinggangshu Village in Pixian District as an Example
常玲敏 CHANG Lingmin 西南交通大学 , 成都 611756 （Southwest Jiaotong University，611756 Chengdu）
摘要：文章从林盘保护的角度出发，结合田园综合体的景观设计策略，探索当前社会背景下川西林盘发展的新思路。首先对林盘 的概念及其设计元素进行了分析，然后就田园综合体的景观设计方法展开讨论，接着以郫都区青杠树村为例，探讨了林盘景观要 素对田园综合体景观营造的影响，为林盘的保护及田园综合体的创新发展提供理论支撑。 关键词：川西林盘；田园综合体；景观设计 Abstract: From the perspective of forest protection, combined with the landscape design strategy of the pastoral complex, this paper explores the new ideas of the development of the forest plate in western Sichuan under the current social background. Firstly, the concept of forest disk and its design elements are analyzed. Then the landscape design method of the pastoral complex is discussed. Then, the Qingbanshu Village in Qidu District is taken as an example to discuss the forest landscape elements to the pastoral complex and theimpact of landscape construction. The paper aims to provide theoretical support for the protection of forest discs and the innovative development ofrural complexes. Key words: western Sichuan forest plate； pastoral complex； landscape design

19 博物馆展示空间灯光设计研究
Research on The Lighting design of Museum Exhibition Space
杨慧 YANG Hui 马云林 MA Yunlin 昆明理工大学 , 昆明 650500（Kunming University of Science and Technology , Kunming 650500）
摘要：衡量现代博物馆室内展示空间水平的一项重要指标就是其光环境运用的合理性。因此，灯光设计的研究是博物馆展示空间 整体设计过程中不可忽视的首要问题。通过对博物馆展示空间灯光设计的研究，分析不同形式的灯光所呈现的艺术效果及其产生 的影响，在此基础上探讨灯光设计在博物馆空间展陈设计中的应用原则和方法，为创造符合参观者认知行为且能够体现展品文化 内涵的展示空间提供理论依据。 关键词：博物馆；展示空间；灯光设计 Abstract: An important indicator of indoor display space level in modern museums is the rationality of the light environment. Therefore,the research of lighting design is the primary issue that cannot be ignored in the overall design process of the museum display space. Through the research on the lighting design of the museum display space, this paper analyzes the artistic effects and influences of different forms of lighting. On this basis, it discusses the application principles and methods of lighting design in the museum display space design. It provides a theoretical basis for creating a display space that is in line with the cognitive behavior of visitors and can reflect the cultural connotation ofexhibits. Key words: museum；exhibition space；lighting design

四、总结 在博物馆展示空间中 ，灯光的运用是否合理 协调会直接影响展览的整体效果 ，而且间接通过 感官影响参观者的观展体验 。灵活运用博物馆空 间中的灯光设计 ，营造出不同的展示空间的艺术 氛围 ，将使博物馆各空间在符合其使用功能的前 提下 ，为参观者提供舒适的观展环境和丰富的视 觉感受 。总之 ，在博物馆展示空间设计中运用好 灯光艺术 ，最主要的是从展品本身的特性出发 ， 结合参观者的观展体验 ，创造出既符合参观者认 知行为模式 ，又能突出展品特性的人性化灯光 设计 。

谢玄晖 XIE Xuanhui 西南交通大学，成都 610031（Southwest Jiaotong University , 610031 Chengdu）
摘要：通过对国内外城市轨道交通车辆车头前脸表情设计的调研与分析，总结城市轨道交通车辆表情设计的构成要素集及其识别 特点。对轨道交通车辆车头的造型要素分解，提取造型特征线，车脸表情组成元素，与人物面部表情进行类比，分析其表情认知 过程的关键信息，实现车头造型设计的物理域与语义域之间的转换，建立城市轨道交通车辆车头前脸表情的认知模型，为提升我 国城市轨道交通车辆装备设计的综合竞争力提供支持。 关键词：轨道交通车辆；车头造型；表情设计；设计认知 Abstract: Based on the investigation and analysis of the facial expression design of urban rail transit vehicles at home and abroad, this paper summarizes the elements and identification features of facial expression design of urban rail transit vehicles. This paper decomposes the modeling elements of the rail transit vehicle head, extracts the modeling feature lines and the components of the facial expressions, and makes an analogy with the facial expressions of the characters. It also analyses the key information of the cognitive process of the facial expressions, realizes the transformation between the physical domain and the semantic domain of the head modeling design, and establishes the facial expressions of the urban rail transit vehicle head. Cognitive model provides support for improving the comprehensive competitiveness of urban rail transit vehicle equipment design in China. Key words: rail transit vehicles；head shape；Emoji design；design cognition

摘要：以文具为设计对象，通过访谈、观察、体验等用户调研，发现现有产品问题与潜在需求点，并运用动态、嵌套、局部质量、 增加不对称性等TRIZ发明原理，进行基于问题解决的实用性方案构思。以春秋淹城三城三河遗址为例，在把握其3圈重复、中心 偏北、内方外圆、曲折有度等主要形态特征的基础上，对其形制进行提取与演变，形成文化方案。进而运用形态分析法对实用方 案、文化方案以及文化元素的产品造型运用方式进行组合与分析，形成整体设计方案。通过此类设计实践，探讨地域文化元素在 实用性文创产品设计中的应用途径，对文化元素的三维造型而非平面装饰的应用与文创产品开发，提供有效的方法借鉴及科学 思维。 关键词：三城三河；实用性；文创产品；应用 Abstract: Taking stationery as the design object, through interviews, observation, experience and other user surveys, the paper studies the existing product problems and potential demand points, and applies TRIZ inventive principles such as dynamic, nested, partial quality, increasing asymmetry to conceive practical solutions based on problem solving. Taking the site of three cities and three rivers as an example, on the basis of grasping its main morphological features such as three circles repetition, North center, inner circle and outer circle, degree of twists and turns, the shape of the site is extracted and evolved to form a cultural scheme. Then the application of morphological analysis method to practical scheme, cultural scheme and product modeling of cultural elements is combined and analyzed to form the overall design scheme. The paper explores the application ways of regional cultural elements in practical creative product design and provides effective methods and scientific thinking for the application of cultural elements in 3D modeling rather than plane decoration and the development of creative products. Key words: three cities and three rivers；practical；cultural creative products；application

Design and Practice of Urban Large-Scale Public Space：A Case Study of Changzhou Xinlong Ecological Forest from the Perspective of Hargreaves’ Triangle Theory
卞云飞 BIAN Yunfei 张琴 ZHANG Qin 武汉理工大学，湖北武汉 430070 （Wuhan University of Technology，430070 Wuhan Hubei）
摘要：阐释哈格里夫斯景观设计三角形理论内涵及要义，在此基础上，以常州新龙生态林为例，从场地、可持续性及记忆性三要 素出发，解析绿地景观项目规划设计的策略和方法，为城市大型公共空间项目的生态设计与实践提供借鉴。 关键词：风景过程主义；三角形理论；场地；生态设计；公共空间 Abstract: Based on interpreting the connotation and essence of Hargreaves’ landscape design Triangle theory and taking Changzhou Xinlong ecological forest as an example, the paper analyzes the method and strategy of urban green space landscape projects designed from the perspective of site, sustainability and memorability.The research results would provide reference and enlightenment for ecological designof large-scale city public space programs. Key words: landscape processlism；triangle theory；site；ecological design；public space
